Author: bailsforreal
Text: By “right” I meant the one they’ll be satisfied with. I told them that I’m so many words, low carb, walking, and being busy, and it’s like they want more. They were even looking at my plate and commenting on my portion size. Liiikkkkee I don’t have a secret to weight loss unless the secret is mental illness luv 😭💀😂

Author: eardingu
Text: The "right" answer is the one they probably already know: eat at a deficit and exercise. That's how "normal" people lose weight anyway and it doesn't expose you.  Good luck with your family, I know how hard it can be.
